Sentencas: We studied the possibility of converting waste toilet paper (WTP) into electricity.
Titulo: Converting Waste Toilet Paper into Electricity: AFirst-Stage Technoeconomic Feasibility Study

Sentencas: WTP is a waste stream with continuous availability and negative cost, but it is difficult to handle, as it contains fecal matter.
Titulo: Converting Waste Toilet Paper into Electricity: AFirst-Stage Technoeconomic Feasibility Study

Sentencas: The process we explored had two stages:
Titulo: Converting Waste Toilet Paper into Electricity: AFirst-Stage Technoeconomic Feasibility Study

Sentencas: WTP gasification followed by direct conversion into electricity in a high-temperature solid-oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Converting Waste Toilet Paper into Electricity: AFirst-Stage Technoeconomic Feasibility Study

Sentencas: The process was studied on a 10 ktpa scale by using real-life parameter values obtained from industrial sources.
Titulo: Converting Waste Toilet Paper into Electricity: AFirst-Stage Technoeconomic Feasibility Study

Sentencas: We presented the basic system design, as well as its electricity yield and overall efficiency on the basis of detailed mass- and energy-balance calculations.
Titulo: Converting Waste Toilet Paper into Electricity: AFirst-Stage Technoeconomic Feasibility Study

Sentencas: By explorative technoeconomic analysis and sensitivity analysis, we found an electric efficiency of 57%, which is similar to that of a natural gas combined cycle plant.
Titulo: Converting Waste Toilet Paper into Electricity: AFirst-Stage Technoeconomic Feasibility Study

Sentencas: The levelized cost of electricity (LCOE) was 20.3 cent kWh(-1), which is comparable at present to that of residential photovoltaic installations.
Titulo: Converting Waste Toilet Paper into Electricity: AFirst-Stage Technoeconomic Feasibility Study

Sentencas: The system's capital costs are relatively high, mainly as a result of SOFC investment costs, but we expect these costs to decrease as the market of cells develops.
Titulo: Converting Waste Toilet Paper into Electricity: AFirst-Stage Technoeconomic Feasibility Study

Sentencas: The operating costs are relatively low, partly thanks to the high thermodynamic efficiency (approximate to 70%).
Titulo: Converting Waste Toilet Paper into Electricity: AFirst-Stage Technoeconomic Feasibility Study

Sentencas: Currently, the fuel costs are negative (because we use waste as a raw material), yet this could change if the value of WTP would increase as a result of this process.
Titulo: Converting Waste Toilet Paper into Electricity: AFirst-Stage Technoeconomic Feasibility Study

Sentencas: Learning effects could make the system more competitive in the future with an LCOE of approximately 11 cent kWh(-1).
Titulo: Converting Waste Toilet Paper into Electricity: AFirst-Stage Technoeconomic Feasibility Study
